17#include "BarcodeFormat.h"
18#include "CharacterSet.h"
19
20#include <string>
21
22namespace ZXing {
23
24class BitMatrix;
25
26/**
27* This class is here just for convenience as it offers single-point service
28* to generate barcodes for all supported formats. As a result, this class
29* offer very limited customization compared to what are available in each
30* individual encoder.
31*/
32class MultiFormatWriter
33{
34public:
35 explicit MultiFormatWriter(BarcodeFormat format) : _format(format) {}
36
37 /**
38 * Used for Aztec, PDF417, and QRCode only.
39 */
40 MultiFormatWriter& setEncoding(CharacterSet encoding) {
41 _encoding = encoding;
42 return *this;
43 }
44
45 /**
46 * Used for Aztec, PDF417, and QRCode only, [0-8].
47 */
48 MultiFormatWriter& setEccLevel(int level) {
49 _eccLevel = level;
50 return *this;
51 }
52
53 /**
54 * Used for all formats, sets the minimum number of quite zone pixels.
55 */
56 MultiFormatWriter& setMargin(int margin) {
57 _margin = margin;
58 return *this;
59 }
60
61 BitMatrix encode(const std::wstring& contents, int width, int height) const;
62
63private:
64 BarcodeFormat _format;
65 CharacterSet _encoding = CharacterSet::Unknown;
66 int _margin = -1;
67 int _eccLevel = -1;
68};
69
70} // ZXing
71
